website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, mountable radio that is waterproof for use in the shower.
pros: Digital tuning and easy-read LCD screen so you can dial in the exact signal you want
Includes a high level of waterproof protection for an electronic device
Runs from replaceable batteries or AC adapter
cons: Some problems with build quality and longevity
Audio quality lags behind some others

website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses its competitors in almost every way: versatility, convenience, and solid design. The best available.
pros: Compelling feature list: waterproof/submersible, 10 preset stations, and more
LED light and alarm in case of weather emergencies
cons: Relatively large and bulky in size

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This radio is *twice* the size and weight as the venerable Sony ICF-79S and the audio is noticeably better (audio quality in the shower is not critical for me). However, despite other reviewers' comments, I did not find the receiver sensitivity (AM or FM) to be an improvement - and receiver sensitivity *is* important to the listening experience. OK - The Sangean does have a flashlight that the Sony lacks... If you're shopping for your first shower radio, this is a good one. If you're looking for a replacement for your ICF-79S, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: David Mackie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! Product, but NO warranty
customer_reviews.text: Like it! Waterproof! BUT went to change the batteries and the bottom door popped off (one tab was broken) Called Sangean, they told me it wasn't under warranty (parts) and it would be $15 plus shipping. There was just enough attitude there that I told him to forget it, I would just duct tape it and not buy the produce again. There are better products with better warranties, and companies that are actually glad to hear from their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: size 9.5 x 5.5 x 2.25
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find size before ordering, so it is title of review. I have been using this shower radio for a couple of months. It is hanging in the shower, but doesn't get directly wet, so I can't say how waterproof it is. The reception in an inner bathroom with no windows is GREAT for local FM station. Buttons are very easy to understand and use in shower, without glasses. Size is 9.5 (slightly less) x 5.5 x 2.25. Uses 2 D cell batteries or plug. I use the handle over the side support of the towel bar. The handle does not swivel, as far as I can tell. This is a sturdy little radio that is perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: Green weaver

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is fine. It's the performance I find lacking. It does not pull in the distant stations I was hoping for (a big reason for buying it). The flexible wire antenna is understandable for a shower radio, but it's a hassle to set and hold a station. The timer seems useless to me. It simply beeps progressively louder and then doesn't shut the radio off at the end of the cycle. I suppose I need to re-read the manual to find its true purpose. The sound quality is better than similar sized radios. Voice and music have a decent range of tone.
customer_reviews.author: ManOnTheStreet

customer_reviews.title: Great FM and Weather Station Not so Great AM
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband's bathroom. He mounted the plate on the wall. Very convenient because the radio detaches easily from the base. He also said that it has a very good speaker. One complaint (but not too important) is the AM reception. It only has an internal antenna for AM. However, it does have a very long FM antenna that can be removed from the battery compartment. FM and WS reception is excellent. The only other complaint he had was the mounting screws were too small to go into a beam, but he had better ones here to use. Would highly recommend this radio unless AM reception is important for your purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Aikin

customer_reviews.title: Solid radio, needs a better antenna
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio for camping. I was looking for a basic AM/FM radio that would pull in stations from 50+ miles. The weather bands were a plus. So far, the radio has been performing satisfactorily. I did not note before I purchased that this radio's FM antenna is a wire that is pulled out of the battery compartment and hangs loose. An external antenna connection or a telescoping antenna would have gotten this radio its fifth star. I know. This is sold as a shower radio. I have never understood why people need radios or even TVs for their shower time. Get clean. Get Out.
customer_reviews.author: South Tahoe Busman

customer_reviews.title: Good Shower Radio
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a smaller radio and I was surprised to see that it is a little bigger than what is shown. I am very satisfied with my purchase, the tuning is very good as well as the sound, do not expect a sound from a Bose, but for a small radio it seems to me that the sound is acceptable. Controls are very easy to use and the design looks durable. My only complaint and it is my fault that the design I bought does not have an alarm clock, otherwise very happy and if you are looking for a good radio for your bathroom, this is the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: 10 years and going...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a H201 shower radio ten years ago. Reception, sound, battery life are exceptional. It has never leaked, failed or faltered a single time over the last decade. The numbers on the volume buttons are beginning to fade a bit, but at the current rate, we may see this thing go another ten years. No, it is not upscale stereo sound, but for the purpose it serves, it is solid. Highest endorsement based on longevity, dependability, function and battery life, which seems to be between a year and a half and two years for each set of D cells installed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice radio with several great features. The memory recall is one and the sound quality is another. The only thing that caught be off guard was the physical size and weight. It was a lot bigger that I thought it would be. I should have checked before I purchased it. Also, it uses D batteries which also makes very heavy. It would be great for wall mounting or hanging from a strong point. It didn't fit well with my tight space. I would definitely recommend it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Russell S.

customer_reviews.title: Possible problem using it in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: Basically OK. I got it to use as a shower radio. Noticed that after a few minutes, the volume would drop way down. It seemed to me that something was getting wet and causing the problem. Not good for a "shower radio". Mounted it up higher where it won't get wet, and the problem went away. The radio is now 7 feet above the floor. That's not a problem for me, but would be for a shorter person or child. So, be careful if you plan to use this where it will get wet. The unit is very nice otherwise. Good quality audio. But a lot of money for something that is questionable for shower use.
customer_reviews.author: KU4A

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable, not great
customer_reviews.text: I like this radio, as it seems to be the best among many sub-optimal options. Pros: sturdy and easy to use. Plenty of preset stations. Uses D batteries that seem to last long. Cons: Not really portable. This is a really big radio. Does not have a telescopic antenna, but there is a wire antenna option. If you attach the wire antenna, it is difficult to carry it where you go. Without the wire antenna, you have to play with the orientation to get the best reception. Still better than the Eton Traveler III that used to waste a lot of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: musicandarts

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT AM/FM RADIO
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this AM/FM radio. When it comes to electronics, she's a no nonsense old school kind of gal. She wanted me to find an AM/FM radio that can set multiple stations with great reception. She's VERY happy with this one. Easy to install the bracket on the wall and even easier to unhook and bring into another room. Easy display and easier setting of stations. And as everyone knows, when the little lady is happy, everybody is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Salazar

customer_reviews.title: The radio meets all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine and the sound quality is good. I just keep it on my favorite AM station. There is an FM antenna, but I haven't used it. It comes with a couple of ways to mount it in the shower, which I thought was great. I have one complaint, and it has nothing to do with the radio. If you live in an area where Amazon is using AMZL for delivery instead of the US Postal Service, think twice. I consider AMZL to be a nightmare and this radio is probably the last thing I will ever order from Amazon that is shipped by Amazon...unless they go back to using the Postal Service.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: best radio yet
customer_reviews.text: Works great !!! i use it at the beach get great reception on Fm weather and AM spotty but rarely use those bands. the batteries last FOREVER!! i use it 8 hours at a clip 2-3 days a week and only after accidentially leaving light on for a week when i put it in my truck did battey level go way down but still not dead. wire antenna works ok, sometimes you have to move it around but wetal antenna will get coated with sand and break..so this is a smart design. also have 2 sangean clock radios both work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tb

customer_reviews.title: So far, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it. I have three other Sangean radios around the house, so I knew the brand was reliable. My old Sony shower radio died after 20 years. They don't make it any more. So, I did a LOT of shopping/research. This was the winner. I knew I wanted digital tuning. No more sliding dials. I'd have preferred AA batteries instead of clunky and expensive "D" cells, but I couldn't find a radio with everything I wanted. If I was to nitpick, I wish it was smaller, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Allen S

customer_reviews.title: Great radio while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: One of my two Sangean radios started misbehaving. Pushing the volume button would change the station. Sometimes, pushing a pre-set button would change the station to some random location with no signal, just static. Sometimes pushing buttons would turn the radio off. Now the second radio is starting to have the same problem. I really like many of the features of these radios: the size, ease of battery changing, display. But I want them to last for more than three or four years.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't automatically announce weather emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item but it doesn't automatically announce a weather alert. You have to set the radio to the weather station before you go to sleep or if in anticipation of a weather emergency. No way. Most people wouldn't be that instinctive. I bought two for each bedroom in our home. But now they are only regular radios. Not weather radios...not in emergencies anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Superior Reception and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio for our outside dogs to stop barking all the time and it works. The radio stays outside and the 2 D cell batteries last for 10 days. Quality built and extremely easy to use with great reception. If your looking for a water resistant radio that actually works with digital tuning and long operation between battery changes this product is for you. I'm very pleased with it and its been in constant operation for over 1 month now.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Using frequently rather than saving for a power failure
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a transistor radio that inconveniently broke during a storm and power failure. Rather than having it tucked away for emergencies I placed it in the bathroom. I use it some mornings when the weather is in question or To catch up on news. It’s a little grainy if you want to listen to music but better than the transistor I replaced. And the price was right. Good durable product. Am thinking about getting the plug in adapter which defeats the purpose in a power failure.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Flawed product
customer_reviews.text: Before I ordered this Sangean, I owned four Sangeans, all of which worked well. This one has static, which I can eliminate by placing my hand on the radio or by holding it in my lap. (As I recall from USAF Communications Officers and Electronics School, this phenomenon is known as "hand capacitance.") I am disappointed that the quality of this Sangean does not match the quality of my other four Sangeans.
customer_reviews.author: VNR

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get !!
customer_reviews.text: This radio works very well. Good sound, lighted display (at turn on), weather radio, flashlight and more. Runs on 2 D cell alkaline batteries with great battery life. Great sound for it's size. Sits on a counter or can be mounted to a wall or hang by the builtin disappearing handle. They really thought this one through before they started building them. Would I recommend it? Absolutely yes !!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeB

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of these for Christmas gifts. My granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for Christmas gifts. My granddaughter hooked hers up Friday, Monday the digital display numbers only show pieces. Cannot determine the station or anything. She will keep it as she only listens to one station in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I keep this radio on the toilet tank of my bathroom and the sound quality is quite good for such a small speaker. Most of the time the reception is very good but occasionally I get interference (on some stations) and have to move around the FM antenna wire. I haven't had much luck with the weather station as the reception for that was fair at best but I will rarely need that feature anyway. Overall a very good radio for the shower/bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We just received this yesterday and started using it. My one warning to you is that it's a bit larger than we initially thought. It comes with a bracket to mount it on the wall, so that's what we did. The reception and sound quality are excellent. I would definitely recommend this radio and recommend you mount it on the wall so it doesn't take up precious space elsewhere in your bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynDoc

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works much better than the SONY brand!
customer_reviews.text: 1st bought a. it failed to receive the stations I wanted. Bought this, very happy with it! Brought in those stations that the SONY would not. I live in Hanover PA, and most stations are in larger cities, some even in Maryland. This radio works well with most stations, though some Baltimore stations require re-orienting the antenna before entering the shower, as once the water begins flowing from the shower head, the signal is weakened on the out of State stations. I have this positioned on the counter top, about 3 feet from the window that has plastic blinds. The, even sitting on the window sill, would not bring in the primary stations I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A. Deskins

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1 to try and loved it so I ordered 3 more. This radio is heavy duty not light weight. Have been shopping for a water proof radio and all have been flimsy. Was looking for something I could take to the lake or beach and not worry about the moisture. Sound is clear and loud. I like the wall plate so I have the option to hang on wall and plug in to wall outlet w/adapter (purchased separate) or take it outside to hot tub. I like the NOAA radio alert.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia L.

customer_reviews.title: sangean H201 am/fm shower radio
customer_reviews.text: great radio... replaced my old sony radio, this one's better. love the mounting/hanging options... it's pretty big, but good looking. there are little quality features all over this radio... handle swings back and tucks out of the way if not using it, little soft pads on the bottom, a strap to hang it from the showerhead pipe... there's more I'm sure. oh, you can get an ac adapter for it if you want to plug it in (sold separately) or put two D cell batteries in it. great buy!
customer_reviews.author: jcc

customer_reviews.title: Good reception, good sound quality. Ruggedly built, pleasing color and design.
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the bathroom on top of the toilet tank cover. With it's antenna wire hanging over the side of the tank it get's the best reception of any other radio we have in the house. No tone adjustment, but the preset tone quality is pleasing to us as it is. White color goes good in the bathroom, it plays well, is sturdy, looks cool and has a neat fold-away handle, and the batteries have lasted now for many months w/o any deterioration in sound quality. So what's not too like?? ;>})
customer_reviews.author: Greywoulf

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SOUND QUALITY,  worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the SECOND SANGEAN portable radio we've purchased. I had to have one for our bathroom and my husband wanted one for his garage. It has a slide handle in the back (which retracts) if you want to hang it up on a hook, or just place it on the counter. We purchased the AC power adapter cord to use it with an outlet or sometimes we use it on battery power. The gorgeous sound is worth the extra money for this radio. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Freehauf

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set and use, good sound, so pretty
customer_reviews.text: The radio is bigger than I expected, but it fits well on a hook in a shower stall. Super pretty in pink! I adore it. It has all functions I need. I do recommend to people who like convenience, simplicity and chose of colors to accent their bathroom. Never saw a radio in pink before!
customer_reviews.author: Laone08

customer_reviews.title: Don't attemp to clean the speaker area.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio in February. At the end of April, it just stopped working today after attempting to clean the speaker area. As of July 2, 2017, the radio started working again. However, I can no longer set the clock. Now it is just an expensive shower radio without the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio and am very satisfied with the construction of it. It is so well made. The sound quality is great and it is easy to operate. The only thing we were disappointed with was the antenna. We would have rathered a pull up metal one instead of a cord. Overall, we love the radio. It was a gift for my wife and she is delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Hebert

customer_reviews.title: No need to look further for a shower radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio was a gift for my wife. It gets used every single day. (By both of us!) It’s simple to operate, and sounds great. If I had any small gripe, it would be that I wish the batteries lasted longer, but two “D” cells last right around three (3) months. I highly recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Stone

customer_reviews.title: ... but the FM reception was awful even in normally easy to reach local stations (Boston area)
customer_reviews.text: Radio has all the features I wanted including waterproofing but the FM reception was awful even in normally easy to reach local stations (Boston area). Static on stations I never had an issue with before even w/ much cheaper radios. Very disappointing, I had done a ton of research before purchasing and the product had great reviews, looked & felt sturdy, digital and all but what good is a radio w/out adequate reception? I'm done with waterproofed radio's convinced they're all lousy.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C.

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing shower radio.
customer_reviews.text: I went through shower radio after shower radio, a new one every few months. Usually they had horrible reception. You had to constantly fiddle with them. The battery would continually die. Then I bought this one. I had it 14 years through 4 homes and feel like I needed to write it an obituary. It finally died today. Had great reception. Batter lasted forever - I think I changed it about once a year if that. Tuned in digitally to stations. Lots of presets. Even a flashlight and emergency alarm which I never used but you always had it just in case the world ended first. I just purchased the newer 2013 model with Bluetooth. May it last until 2034.
customer_reviews.author: CaryS

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my wifes 30 year old Sony Tap Tunes shower radio...
customer_reviews.text: My wife's Sony Tap Tunes shower radio somehow survived 30 years (on the shower wall) before biting the dust. The demise of the Sony was a major emergency in my house (a happy wife is a happy life :) and so I set out in search of a replacement. I came across the Sangean H201 and it seems an improvement in all respects. Definitely improved sound quality, an electronic tuner, and too many additional features to list. Now if it lasts 30 years.....
customer_reviews.author: Moe Norman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like it's under water
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these in the past 2 years. Both failed in about a year. Speaker cuts out. Sounds like it's under water. I dropped the first one, so thought it was on me. Bought another because it's a nice radio until it fails. Second one did the same thing. Checked out their return policy. The hassle is not worth the price of the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful radio
customer_reviews.text: I gave this radio to my husband as a gift. He uses it when he is working outside or fishing as well on the beach. He has told me several times he likes it! The little wire antenna works well, especially on the beach. One doesn't have to worry about being careful not to bend the old style "pull up aluminum" antenna. The rotating handle is a plus too! It is very sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: JBT

customer_reviews.title: The best radio on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one, 2 given as gifts. I looked high and low for a portable radio with good AM reception. No other radio in my home could pull in good reception for baseball games . I have had my radio for at least 10 years.....there is NO better
customer_reviews.author: Raidergrode

customer_reviews.title: It suits its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Placed on high my shower wall, chance to catch up on the news. Sound is good (for its size) but after 5-10 minutes it gives out (batteries ok). The display clock drifts and needs to be reset every few months. I have had this for some time and this behavior started early on, just never bothered to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: 71MGB

customer_reviews.title: Great color and as good as the one that
customer_reviews.text: broke down after 6 or 7 years. This time we ordered the bluish one and we love it ! We don't need to use the antenna to get clear broadcasting on our radio shows that we listen too. I highly recommend this . It is certainly water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio...but price is a concern.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this radio. It is sturdy and very well built and the controls are simple and laid out logically. The sound is clear and has no problem filling a room and does not distort even at the highest volume level. I do not use this as a shower radio. In my experience all shower radios, no matter how 'water proof'' ultimately die due to water infiltration. I prefer to leave it sit on the bathroom counter well away from the shower. I purchased this radio in Dec/15 for $71.25 and that was a fair price. Now this unit is close to a hundred bucks. Maybe not worth that, thus the 4-star review.
customer_reviews.author: drkeith

customer_reviews.title: Best radio ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best radio ever. Regardless of whether you are using it in the shower as I do or using outside as I do, the reception is excellent, the functions are easy to use and the bonus built-in flashlight is now an LED light, which is an improvement over the last model (which lasted me 6 years through abuse that would have caused a Pro Wrestler to surrender!). There is also a built-in alarm and radio pre-sets that are easy to set and use. Don't hesitate to buy this radio if you need a radio of any kind. That said, the water resistant feature is great and the radio functions great in the rain or the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Floogelfish

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATER-RESISTANT PORTABLE RADIO
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water-resistant portable radio! I like that it has good sound and 5 button pre-sets on both AM and FM bands -- but mostly I like that it is water-resistant. I bought one for use in the shower -- and it worked so well, I bought a second one to use at poolside, where it is always subject to splashing. No problems with either one.
customer_reviews.author: Mo H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality radio that can live in the shower
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice radio with surprisingly good reception and sound quality (single speaker). Has a generous number of station presets. I highly recommend it as a shower or workshop radio. It can get wet daily in the shower, or dirt can be rinsed off in the workshop, no problems. I would definitely buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: ahilltopper

customer_reviews.title: I love this Radio!
customer_reviews.text: My disabled daughter uses this radio, not only in the shower but everywhere. Great high-quality sound and easy for her to carry around. Works well in the shower as well which she loves! It is on the higher end but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: This is one amazing radio!
customer_reviews.text: This radio is amazing. It has a great tuner. My husband uses it when he takes a shower, but doesn’t keep the radio in the shower. I just bought a second one for him for Father’s Day so he could use it outside when he works in his garden.
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: It lasted 2 years in the shower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in April 2018, and it lasted until June 2020. It was used every day in the shower. The speaker is sensitive to water, and that would cause the sound to change at times. It's heavy (uses 3 D batteries), so I did not try to attach it to the wall. Batteries lasted a long time (9 months), though it was probably only used 20-25 minutes a day. I feel that I should have gotten a longer life from it, so I am going to look for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best portable radio I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the first Sangean H201 I ordered a few years ago that I ordered a second one this year. It is hands-down the best portable radio I have owned. It has excellent sound quality and easy-to-use controls, and it has nice "heft" - that is, it doesn't tip over or slide around even though I keep it on a bathroom counter that gets lots of use. The flip-up handle makes it easy to carry. The battery life is excellent - in the five years I since I bought my first Sangean, I've only changed the batteries once. Bottom line: The Sangean H201 is an excellent, well-designed radio.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Massachusetts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and reception quality!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a radio for the bathroom. I like to listen while I shower. This seemed like more than I needed, but the last cheap one I bought failed in less than a year. This one is so much more. I love that it has presets like the car radio, and has touch buttons for volume and presets. Very good sound. Other radios always had trouble pulling in the AM signals that I listen too. This one does great! I have only had it for 3 months, but it seems to do a good job of keeping water away from electronics. Very sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: KayJay

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality radio
customer_reviews.text: This Sangean H201 replaces several $25 "water resistant " shower radios that each failed after a couple of years. I've always hung them on a towel rack, and never actually in the shower in direct contact with the water. They just stopped working properly, from the humidity in the bathroom. This radio seems extremely solid and well made. It's easy to use, and sounds great. I'm confident that this will last a long time, and wish I had bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Bf312

customer_reviews.title: The radio is doing what it was supposed to do and doing it well.
customer_reviews.text: Received this in June and I still have the original batteries in it and it is still on three bars. I run it about 30 minutes a day every day when I am showering. It is not directly in the shower; just gets covered with steam. The sound is nice; has a deep rich tone to it. The radio is NOT light, however it was designed to be more of a countertop radio. But it is built solidly. Assuming the energy bar readout is accurate, I would certainly recommend this radio for everyday listening. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Khazad

customer_reviews.title: Really nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio, great sound, really great tuner. I love it. It is a little larger than a "clutch" radio but not to much and I suspect the size is what enables it to play such a good music. It just took a little while to figure out how to get into and out of the weather stations and once this is figured out it is no longer worth mentioning. I will probably by another one for my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Henry K

customer_reviews.title: Great radio!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a waterproof radio for the bathroom when taking a shower. I have it on a door hook across from the shower and hear it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paulgro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I have one in the shower. For more than a year it seems. Original batteries. Sound and reception is excellent. Recently purchased another one for the garage which gets a lot of condensation. Excellent product. Keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound wow love this .. only complaint is it doesn’t come with cord to plug in
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: no ac adaptor
customer_reviews.text: I would give this more stars, but I was surprised to find out that there was no ac adaptor for this radio in the box. I should have read the details more carefully, but it seems odd to sell a radio without an ac adaptor. I have now purchased the adaptor, which is sold separately, but I would have given this more stars if the adaptor were included.
customer_reviews.author: bmore72

customer_reviews.title: I love this little radio!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted for a bedside and take-along radio. Reasonable sound quality. Easy push button tuning. I don't use it in the shower so I can't speak to that feature, but I would recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: kcooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Radio! I have many Sangean Radios
customer_reviews.text: Nice Radio! I have many Sangean Radios, and I have never been let down. I am a radio collector and I have nothing but 5 star ratings on all of them. This radio is no different, great reception, nice and heavy construction, If you are a radio buff like myself, you will not be disappointed ! I give this radio 5 stars and was worthy of my critical reviews of other manufacturers . I am going to buy one for my basement bathroom, and am so impressed with Sangean radios, I have made many of my friends happy with my opinion of these radios. Buy Buy!
customer_reviews.author: William Paul Shields

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it doesn’t have a million buttons. Preset radio stations work well. Setting the time etc. is easy. Nice that there is a flashlight and alarm button for emergencies. Two D cell batteries make it extremely heavy. I use it on a night stand, not in the shower. The screen does not light up at night so I can’t tell what time it is if the room is dark.
customer_reviews.author: C--

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works well and it's waterproof. Clean modern design and it has a handle if you prefer to hang it up. Sound quality is good but not better than my last shower radio. It's a bit too large and occupies most of the space on the shelf in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a fairly small bathroom. Works great, even with the humidity and steam from showering. Crystal clear FM reception. I have it on the tub ledge outside the shower curtain (not in direct contact with water) and have had it several months now with no problems. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wenger6

customer_reviews.title: well made- great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my grandmother, she gets along with the large buttons and the 5 option memory comes in handy for her. i bought it to her since she wanted a radio that doesn't looses its memory when there is a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dankner

customer_reviews.title: A Really Good Bath Radio Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. The radio works very well in the bath. In this particular case, the old one fell off the counter and stopped working. My wife liked the sound and the way that the original one worked, so she wanted to get another one. We will be a lot more careful with this one. This new one comes with a wall mount, which is pretty cool. Batteries seem to last a reasonably long enough time. We are pleased, and would recommend this radio to others.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great features!
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio loaded with features! For example, it comes with a snooze function and a flashlight. I have gotten good FM reception. (I haven't tried AM yet.) It's waterproof so I can take it to the beach. I can get weather alerts here in hurricane country! This was a great purchase that meets my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing dud.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is a total dud. The clock never worked. I set it repeatedly, and it just moved along on its own time, having nothing to do with normal human time. Within a few weeks of buying it, the radio stopped working completely. Didn't work with new batteries, didn't work with the adaptor plug. Note that there's a real range of reviews for this radio. It seems like a lottery whether you get a good one or bad. No quality control. And by the way, it doesn't come with a plug. If you want one, you have to buy it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Louise's granddaughter

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shower Radio I've ever had to Date
customer_reviews.text: This is my third H-201 radio. I'm suprised to find a product of an unknown brand to have similar if not better quality than well established brands. Though not cheap this radio is excellent. The batteries last forever , all contols are water resistant using high quality silicon, sound is perfect, reception is good, the alarm and integrated flash light is icing on the cake. Have one in my shower (the first bought a few years ago), another one in my bed room and the newest one for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Montanez Nazario

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. All these radios seem to only work with the dangling wire for the antenna ..... which can be annoying. I get good reception with the antenna wire wound around the radio in a fairly inconspicuous way. Controls are easy.
customer_reviews.author: David Maass

customer_reviews.title: This is the best shower radio out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower radio out there! It is the nicest, quality made shower radio I've ever owned--and I've owned many. The hanging hook/handle is uniquely designed which makes it easy to hang or carry. The 6 presets tune the stations in and are easy to change. The sound is very rich and comparable to something you'd have or use on your desk or computer sound system. It's also loud enough to use out of the shower and around your house or apartment. It would sound great at the beach or on a picnic This radio feels like a very high quality piece of electronic equipment that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Vercic

customer_reviews.title: A good addition to my camping trips!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio because it can run on batteries, could handle incidental rain, had a backlit display, and was digital. Turns out it has some other great features like a flashlight, clock, warning signal that gets progressively louder, carrying handle and carrying strap, will run on AC (adapter not included) and timer for the radio. There are two stations that I listen to regularly and I was able to pick up one of the stations in the middle of the Adirondack mountains while camping. I haven't used it very long (~20 hours), so I can not address battery life. So overall, I'm very satisfied with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: tupera

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my husband with excellent reception
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my husband with excellent reception! We've had this for exactly a month. Our bathroom usually has very poor reception so I spent a few more dollars and ordered this radio with strong reception and it was worth every penny. It's larger than the last shower radio we had so we purchased a chrome basket that goes over the shower head which holds this shower radio perfectly!! We love the timer and hope that we never need to use the flashlight and panic button but I'm glad to know it's there just in case.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: H201 white shower radio - great value
customer_reviews.text: This is the most sensitive portable radio I have ever used, and the most well engineered. I am using it aboard my white solar powered vehicle in a town with weak radio signals. The weather frequency reception is also very clear and strong with useful weather alert function available during my tornado and hurricane season. 2 D cells is the most economical battery arrangement possible. Sound quality is exceptional for the size of this thing. Clock, timers and backlight all well thought out and implemented.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: I use this radio in my bathroom but don't have it suctioned to anything nor do I use it in the shower. I like it because it shows minutes and seconds when it's off, I can turn the sound up enough to hear it over running water, and it gives me programmable stations.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs an Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Since there are more than a thousand reviews, mine will be short. I missed the fact that this radio ships without an AC adapter. These are readily available, but obviously add to the price. The design and quality of the radio are a pleasant surprise. The sound is also very pleasant, not perhaps audiophile, but not tinny at all.
customer_reviews.author: Iconoclast

customer_reviews.title: Long Life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in December of 2017 and the batteries are still going strong on an average use of 15-20 minutes per day. The FM reception is strong and the audio is what you would expect from a shower radio.
customer_reviews.author: Suj

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this radio 6 years ago and has been working perfectly ever since. It's been hanging in the shower all this time and obviously well protected against water. It replaced a Sony shower radio, which oddly had the top control membrane buttons break down and died. The controls are fairly simple and easy to understand, even the time setting. It also has a built-in light in case of sudden power failure and a siren thankfully I've never needed. This is also a good radio for camping trips, rain or shine. In my experience Sangean makes excellent radios made of good quality materials and produces good sound.
customer_reviews.author: MBM

customer_reviews.title: Easily and by far the best shower radio I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily and by far the best shower radio I've ever owned. I've gone through several over the years. The audio quality from the one speaker of this radio is surprisingly good. It has a rich bass sound and can easily be heard over a noisy shower. The battery life is much stronger than that of prior radios I've owned and when the battery starts to weaken, it cuts off, but can be powered up for a brief time to continue listening to that story the DJ was telling. I've used this radio for more than two years and could not be more satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this radio in the shower but I will say I like this unit very much. It has good sound quality and it pulls in AM stations quite well. Battery life seems to be excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: NICE RADIO
customer_reviews.text: The radio is very attractive. It seems to have a better volume on AM stations then FM stations, which is pretty weird. Easy to set up stations. Very nice radio.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: We have the radio in our shower so we can listen to NPR in the morn. The sound quality & reception are good. I'm glad the design includes an external antenna in the form of a two ft., flexible wire. Kudos! Considering it's cost & what seems to be solid construction, I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Sony ICFS79W
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of Sony shower radio - model ICFS79W. I was very happy with them except that the membrane switches on top would eventually crack and let water into the radio and then it would die. They lasted quite a while, but it's a poorly engineered feature. So after reading good Amazon reviews, I bought this Sangean radio and could not be happier with it. There are two things that make it better than the Sony: 1. No membrane switches (and it's totally waterproof) 2. Better sound quality than the Sony. Easier to hear the A.M. news in the shower. If I ever break it, I'll buy another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Long Beach Native

customer_reviews.title: Finally an excellent full feature portable radio
customer_reviews.text: This Sangean portable Am/FM radio is well designed, has excellent features, is nice looking and a decent price. Glad some company is still making radios.
customer_reviews.author: JaxRox

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely radio with good sound quality. However I had to return it because it was too large to fit on the narrow bathroom shelf. The picture of the radio is deceptive. Measure before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Cookiel

customer_reviews.title: Light didn't work right out of the box....was replaced soon after purchase, and has been a great radio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio based on the positive reviews. And was quite pleased with it's performance and features when I received it. The ONLY problem I've had is that the light does not work. At all. Right out of the box two days ago. This makes me wonder how long the rest of the functions will, well, function. I'd say Sangeon has a great product but perhaps their quality control isn't so great. Update on 12/25/17: I've now had this radio (a replacement, see original comment) since 9/15/12. The radio continues to be my hot tub radio. It has withstood -35F temps in Alaska since purchase. I am impressed with it's longevity, functionality, and sound.
customer_reviews.author: 1Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, long battery life too.
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio and am using it in the bathroom. The sound is great and I have not changed the batteries since purchase. Prior to this, I had a smaller radio I used in the bathroom and I was changing batteries about every 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Love this radio!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this radio in June of 2016 (going on almost 2 years) and use it appropriately 30 min. every morning for talk radio while showering, shaving and getting dressed. Love this radio. Installed inside the shower and has stayed put with no problem. Don’t really use it for music so not worried about sound quality of music. Its fine for me. Love the fact that it has push button presets. Im still using the same batteries I put in almost two years ago, and like I said I use it every day for half an hour. I would highly recommend this radio! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Only radio I found that would pick up AM1150 where I live near Los Angeles. I tried several. Have no use for it in the shower or for any other station.
customer_reviews.author: Knucklehead

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description - No weather bands
customer_reviews.text: This low rating is NOT for the radio itself but for the description. This radio does NOT have any weather bands. The manufacturer's description is also INCORRECT. There are NO weather bands and there are only 5 presets for AM and 5 for FM. The manufacturer's description is for model H202. I am returning my purchase due to the incorrect description.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mavin

customer_reviews.title: ideal for shower
customer_reviews.text: was looking at sony shower radio but reading reviews and after talking to friend who has a sony..... was told the buttons on top wear out and break. I took chance on this unit. Very pleased so far (1 week of use). If weight counts, it is great. Nice look, easy to read the display and sounds good on talk radio. Sensitive is ok even by leaving the small wire antenna inside the case. Light is novelty since it doesn't put out a very bright light (guess it would be alright if you had no power and were in complete darkness). Hangs well with the enclosed bracket and double sided tape. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Really nice radio
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this radio. He uses it in the bathroom, outside, ..everywhere. It has a neat handle and he just caries it around. The sound is MUCH better than his old radio so I'm happy. It isn't the cheapest but generally you get what you pay for. This time I think we got more than we paid for. It's an all-round very nice radio. It is nice and sleek looking. Would an audiophile be happy? probably not but it suits our purposes extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: Makes showering alone fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good shower radio, sound quality is great though mono, it is very easy to program in your favorite stations and easy to use, and the batteries seem to last forever. I like that it is a handy tool when the power is out with its light and ability to hear any emergency messages. I also like that you can hang it from the shower faucet or stand it on a ledge or shelf. And it's quick and easy to change stations when a commercial comes on. I mostly like it for rocking out in the shower. It would be even better if it had stereo speakers, but it's hard to complain about such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Smiling Frog Reviews

customer_reviews.title: A very good product from a very good Brand! Included wall mount kit is Great..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I feel the AC could have easily been built in, but I ended up getting the AC adapter. What I really liked is the included wall mounting kit! Very nice. I don't think there are very many Wall Mountable small radios like this.. I looked and looked.. The Sangean Brand is very good also, so I knew from previous experience that I'd be satisfied with this product... (Now if I could just find a very small desktop stereo AM/FM amplifier! :) )
customer_reviews.author: M Sartor

customer_reviews.title: I love this radio!
customer_reviews.text: It was between this one and the Sony shower radio, and based on other's reviews and product features, I went the Sangean and I'm so glad I did! It is larger than I envisioned, but that is a good thing. It has large, easy to read displays; it's super easy to program; no screwdriver needed for the battery compartment or pesky screws to get rusty; and it sounds great! This shower radio has already come out of the shower and is following me to other parts of the house. I can see myself taking it out when I start my gardening again next spring and summer. It's very sturdy and solid, and it looks good. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: First Sangean Product--Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this "for my spouse" as a birthday gift. I use it more than my spouse does. It has excellent sound and is super powerful at tuning in stations. I love the clock on it--it comes in handy when I'm getting ready for work. The batteries have not needed to be replaced yet and we've been using it since April. We don't have ours in the shower. We mounted it above our bathroom sink. The sound carries over the sound of the water very well. I'll be buying Sangean products in the future. We could use a clock radio in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: That Review Person

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit bigger than what I'd plan to out in the shower but it's sturdy and the sound quality is great. I like that it comes in colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sangean Portable Radio is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Sangean Portable Radios and think they are great, They are waterproof, have a number of station pre-sets, Weather radio, flashlight and only require 2 D batteries, which really last a long time. The sound is loud an clear. I'd highly recommend this radio to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower I ever owned. It may seem a little pricy but we have owned many and this has got to be the best. We use it in the shower on the far side so no water is directly hitting it but it is waterproof it did get hit. The volume is superb and the wire type antenna can be moved in any direction to get the best reception you might need. It has many presets to put your favorite stations in. I expect this radio to last many years. Lets hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Fraternity Shower
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my fraternity's communal shower. Works well and is definitely waterproof. It has a long, wire antennae, and most importantly (for me), a clock, so I don't spend too long in the shower. Good battery life, good volume. My only complaint is that it occasionally doesn't pick up some of the channels, but it works 95% percent of the time. It may not be the radio's fault, but possibly we abused the antennae or there is some signal interference.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic; Worth Every Penny.
customer_reviews.text: I don't often submit reviews, but this product is so outstanding that I can't recommend it highly enough. Yes, it's a little on the expensive side, but trust me that it's well worth it for this solid, well-constructed, great sounding radio. I've had cheap shower radios before, and they've never lasted more than a month or two. 14 months after I purchased this one, it still sounds great and still has two out of three bars of battery life. I really like the pre-sets, the great sound and volume, and the illuminated clock. In short, this has everything I'd been looking for in a shower radio. Stop looking; just buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice portable radio. It’s size makes it quite stable which is a positive. The 3 D cell batteries will minimize battery replacement which is an attribute I was looking for. Very pleased with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C in CT

product_meta.title: Sangean H201 Portable AM/FM/Weather Alert Digital Tuning Waterproof Shower Radio
product_meta.description: Size:Single| Color:WhiteThe Sangean waterproof H201 radio allows you can enjoy your morning news, your favorite radio show, stock and financial news, or your local ball games. Unlike other shower radios, most of which are just water resistant; The Sangean H201 is made with JIS7 standard, which is waterproof. This radio is submersible and meets waterproofing standards that are equal to marine radios. It is so versatile that you can enjoy your radio programs while showering, take it on a fishing trip, take it to the beach, and never be afraid of water or sand damaging your radio. If you get caught in the rain, It doesn't matter. If you drop it off your boat while fishing, this radio will float. This radio has a loud audio that sounds great, excellent reception quality, extremely portable, and runs on two "D" Cell batteries that will last a long time without having to change them. The push-button controls and waterproof speaker are impervious to any wet environments. Built with a sturdy, White cabinet, This radio has 5 digital presets for each band (AM/FM). you can easily lock into your favorite stations without relying on inaccurate dial tuning. Other great features include set time (1 to 120 minutes), Led flashlight, Battery level indicator, large LCD read out clock, emergency buzzer, plus other Features. Who could Ask for much more. . . If you are looking for a top of the line, All around radio look no further.
feature_bullets: 25 Memory Presets (10 FM, 5 AM and 5 WX) with Auto Seek Function, Adjustable Sleep & Short Timers, and Real Time Clock with Large Easy-to-Read Backlit LCD Display
Public Alert Certified Weather Radio, Receives all 7 NOAA Weather Channel and Reports
Waterproof up to JIS7 Standard with a Water-Resistant Speaker
Emergency LED Illumination (Torch), Emergency Buzzer, Large and Easy to Read LCD Display, Battery Power Indicator
Built in Swivel Handle, Suitable for Hanging, Adjustable Carrying / Hanging Strap and Wall Mounting Plate with Hardware included
Built-In AM Antenna and Wire Pigtail Antenna For FM & WX. Operates on 2 D Cell Batteries or AC Power adapter (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,058 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
